amendment.description: To subpoena certain Office of Management and Budget documents and records.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1286 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 17.
Amendment SA 1286 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: S401-406; text: CR S401-402) To subpoena certain Office of Management and Budget documents and records.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1286 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1286 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 17.
